OrgName.entry: RECEPTION, REFERENCE AND INFORMATION LIBRARY - INFORMATION FOR SMALL BUSINESS

Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Provides a reference and information service on all aspects of business including starting a business, management, financial procedures, trading overseas and taxation. Information about local, national and international companies including identifying who makes or supplies specific products and services. Collections of leaflets from local advice and information agencies. Special collections include trade directories, trade journals, statistics, market research, standards, patents, trade names. Holds Patent Clinics and meetings of Sheffield Inventors' Group. Facilities include A4/A3 photcopier, Aladdin video magnifier and microfiche/microfilm reader/printer. Also gives talks to groups on specific resources available within the Business, Science and Technology Library, please contact for advance bookings. Provides 2 People's Network computers and a scanner available for public use. All computers have Microsoft Office and Internet access.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon 10am-8pm, Tues, Thurs, Fri & Sat 9.30am-5.30pm, Wed 9.30am-8pm
